author: smuzaffar
body:
This should fix the unit test failure for UBSAN. For UBSAN IBs , there was some output like [a] and `grep '++'` was matching some of these extra line which contained  `/c++/`  string. This change makes sure that we only match files with start with '++'.

Local tests for UBSAN shows that test runs after this change
title: [UBSAN] Fix for FWCore unit tests
